# NSPersonNameComponentDelimiter | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ NSPersonNameComponentDelimiter ](/documentation/Foundation/NSPersonNameComponentDelimiter)

-  NSPersonNameComponentDelimiter 

Global Variable# NSPersonNameComponentDelimiter

iOS 9.0+iPadOS 9.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.11+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
let NSPersonNameComponentDelimiter: String
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSPersonNameComponentDelimiter#Discussion)

The character or characters used to separate name components.

For names in CJK languages, there is no delimiter.
